section.name: Unit 2: Digging Deeper Into IET Program Design Elements
section.summary:
By the end of this unit, you will be able to:

  1. Describe the core elements of a quality IET (Integrated Education and Training) program design and how they support learner success.
  2. Identify elements of quality program design in program examples.
  3. Describe the roles that adult education program staff and external partners can play in implementing an IET program.

After you complete the activities in this section, return to the main course page to complete the application activity.Â
